text: About Policies Contact Main Menu About Policies Contact About Telee Brown A Leader With a Vision Dedicated and committed to advocacy and community development, championing initiatives that drive lasting social impact. Biography The Journey to Public Service Telee Brown has dedicated his life to improving the lives of citizens through thoughtful policy, community engagement, and forward-thinking leadership. Born and raised in our city, Brown understands firsthand the challenges and opportunities that shape our community. With over two decades of experience in community organizing, immigrant advocacy, and social services, Deacon Telee Brown has been instrumental in empowering diverse communities across Staten Island, the U.S., and Liberia. His leadership has fostered meaningful change, securing critical resources and creating spaces that promote cultural preservation and social development. Outside his political life, Brown is an avid runner, volunteers at the local food bank, and enjoys spending quality time with his family exploring the natural beauty of our region. Click here Now Visual Journey Moments that Matter Explore key moments from Telee Brown’s career and community involvement through this visual gallery Little Liberia Way Little Liberia Way in Staten Island is a landmark achievement recognizing the cultural, economic, and historical contributions of the Liberian community . This initiative not only celebrates the rich heritage of Liberians in Staten Island but also fosters a sense of identity, unity, and pride among residents. Old Folks Food Bank A dedicated space for seniors to showcase and sell cultural products, traditional food, and artisanal crafts . This initiative not only provides economic opportunities but also serves as a vital platform for preserving and sharing heritage with future generations. Giving Back Foundation A foundation established with a clear mission: to uplift underserved communities by providing essential resources, educational opportunities, and social support programs that empower individuals to build better futures. About Policies Contact Main Menu About Policies Contact Our Policies Why You Need to vote Telee Brown brings decades of experience, a deep understanding of community needs, and a proven track record of service. From championing social services to leading grassroots initiatives, he’s not just talking—he’s doing the work. Telee listens, leads with integrity, and takes action to create real change. If you want a results-driven leader who puts people first, Telee Brown is the clear choice for the 49th District. What We Are Expert At Telee Brown’s Six Core Policy Principles Community Empowerment & Social Services With decades of frontline experience, I understand the importance of accessible and effective social services. I will work to strengthen programs that support families, seniors, youth, and immigrants—ensuring every resident has access to the help they need, when they need it. Telee Brown Let’s move forward together. Join me in shaping a brighter future! Affordable Housing & Tenant Protection Everyone deserves a safe and affordable place to call home. I will advocate for policies that expand affordable housing options, protect tenants from unjust evictions, and invest in public housing improvements. Telee Brown Let’s move forward together. Join me in shaping a brighter future Economic Opportunity & Small Business Growth Through Telee Brown Giving Back Foundation and other initiatives, I’ve seen the transformative power of economic opportunity. I will champion small business development, job training, and equitable economic policies that empower local entrepreneurs and working families. Telee Brown Let’s move forward together. Join me in shaping a brighter future! Public Safety & Justice Reform Public safety must be rooted in trust, transparency, and fairness. I support community-based policing, violence prevention initiatives, and reforms that ensure the justice system serves all residents equally and justly. Telee Brown Let’s move forward together. Join me in shaping a brighter future! Youth Engagement & Education Our youth are our future. I will invest in educational programs, after-school activities, and mentorship opportunities that uplift young people and help them reach their full potential—because every child deserves a chance to succeed. Telee Brown Let’s move forward together. Join me in shaping a brighter future! Cultural Inclusion & Civic Engagement From the Little Liberia Way project to the Staten Island Liberian Community Association, I’ve worked to celebrate our diversity. I’ll continue to fight for representation, inclusion, and civic education that brings all voices into the decision-making process. Telee Brown Let’s move forward together.
